solution_line_template: The {num_sweaters} sweaters need {num_sweaters} x {yarn_balls_per_sweater} = <<{num_sweaters}*{yarn_balls_per_sweater}={total_yarn_balls}>>{total_yarn_balls} balls of yarn.
So, Chantal will spend {total_yarn_balls} x ${cost_per_ball} = $<<{total_yarn_balls}*{cost_per_ball}={total_yarn_cost}>>{total_yarn_cost} in all for the balls of yarn.
Her total earnings for selling {num_sweaters} sweaters is ${sell_price_per_sweater} x {num_sweaters} = $<<{sell_price_per_sweater}*{num_sweaters}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
